Does it answer your questions??????

Ok, here goes:

First of all you need Alcohol 120% to install this, it's easy to find, and free of charge. Just google for it.

Then when you install it, it will ask for a serial. Get one from the key-gen pack'd in the folder.

Then when it's installed you need to activate it. I know for a fact that people have had a bit of trouble there, but not to worry.

When you are asked to activate it, select to do it over the phone, then you will be given your 'activation number'. But no need to call 'em, just copy/past the number into the key-gen and it will give you an auth code..

Enjoy this fine program :)

ps. you don't need alcohol to install this. a windows installer is included. when using the keygen, make sure to set the keygen to illustrator cs2. and even though i have not tried yet, the keygen is a multiple adobe keygen for creative suite 2 premium/standard. yahoo.
